entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Professor Quirrell is mentioned as someone who is being looked at by Harry and is also the subject of Snape's jealousy.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is introduced as a Potions teacher who is after Quirrell's job and has knowledge of Dark Arts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as the one giving start-of-term notices to students.

entities.name: weasley twins
entities.description: The Weasley twins are mentioned as being reminded by Dumbledore to follow rules.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Mr. Filch is introduced as the caretaker who has asked Dumbledore to remind students about no magic in corridors.

relationships.description: Snape is jealous of Quirrell's job, as mentioned by the text: 'everyone knows he’s after Quirrell’s job'.
Dumbledore reminds the Weasley twins to follow rules, as mentioned in the text: 'Dumbledore’s twinkling eyes flashed in the direction of the Weasley twins'.

Filch asks Dumbledore to remind students about no magic in corridors, as mentioned in the text: 'I have also been asked by Mr Filch, the caretaker, to remind you all that no magic should be used between classes in the corri-dors'.
